description: This file sets up a knowledge base from a PDF URL, initializes an agent with a Claude model, and prompts the agent to answer a question about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads content from a PDF URL and stores it in a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with a language model and a knowledge base to generate responses.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A class representing the Claude language model from AWS.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for vector database operations using PostgreSQL and pgvector.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the model's response to a given prompt, optionally in markdown.
